QuestData.Title: A Goblin in Shark's Clothing
QuestData.Description: Combining the remains of the Mechachicken with these shark parts, we've assembled the greatest fighting submersible of all time: the Mechashark X-Steam!$B$BHobart and I want you to pilot it, $n. Go west to the water and activate the Mechashark X-Steam Controller.$B$BYou must kill The Hammer if we're to have any hope of exploiting the natural resources of the Dire Strait to their fullest extent. It's for the good of the cartel!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Use the Mechashark X-Steam to slay this monstrosity!
QuestData.LogDescription: Activate a Mechashark X-Steam Controller and use the Mechashark X-Steam to slay The Hammer.
QuestData.CompletionText: That monstrously humongous shark is not dead yet! Do I have to do everything myself?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, my $g boy : girl;! The Town-In-A-Box is saved and the Bilgewater Cartel will be profitable once again thanks to my overwhelmingly unbelievable intellect and tinkering know-how.
